examples: We have to at least try to finish this recount.
Tenemos que intentar al menos terminar este recuento.
The numbers are in on the machine recount.
Los números están en el recuento de la máquina.
If they had completed the recount by the deadline, ...
Si hubieran completado el recuento antes de la fecha límite, ...
... has voted to suspend the recount.
... ha votado a favor de suspender el recuento.
